page.title: 02SHOPPING IN N.W.NEWCASTLE.
page.content: There are{160 shops}in use in our area and there are 11 empty premises mainly because of{increasing rents and rates. Most of the shops are in groups of more than 5 and there are very few {"corner shops"}left.69 of the shops sell food of various types. { 82%}of people interviewed shop more than once a week and find shops within easy access for most of their needs exept for large houeshold goods,such as clothes and D.I.Y.There is a clear need for banks.{Kingston Park Centre was the most popular.It is clean,well set out,has good parking and delivery facilities.Presentation of other shops needs improvement.{72%}think there should be more provision for young children and better access for the elderly or disabled.{54%}think prices are reasonable.{93%}think that the quality of the goods is adequate.
